title: Quebec license plates
content:
If you can find enough letters, I'll make the font for you, but I doubt it's something you'll be able to find as a font.   
   
There are lots of fonts inspired by license plates, you can start with:   
   
 [Sauerkrauto](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221715/http:/chank.com/font_detail.php?sku=5267)   
and   
 [Platelet](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221715/http:/emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PPlaR.html)
author: matt_desmond
